name: ejaculatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to the action of ejaculating (= producing a sudden flow of semen from the penis): Most patients who undergo the procedure want to preserve ejaculatory function. The clinic is mainly concerned with male infertility, erectile dysfunction and ejaculatory disorders. See also
ejaculatory ductRelated words
ejaculate
ejaculation
More examplesFewer examplesImpotence or ejaculatory problems occur in less than 1% of patients taking the drug.Potential side effects of the drugs include ejaculatory failure, but there is no adverse effect on erection. Generally speaking, ejaculatory control is far better among older men than it is in younger men.
